meanings.definition: A person or thing that galvanizes.
meanings.sent1: The galvanizer at the factory ensured all the machines were working efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The new manager was a great galvanizer, motivating the team to reach their goals.
meanings.sent3: The little robot claimed to be a galvanizer of dreams, promising to make them come true.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter acted as a galvanizer, lifting the spirits of everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The superhero was known as the galvanizer, inspiring hope in the hearts of the citizens.
